title: How do I change the SSID (network name) of my wireless network?
answer:
The SSID is the name of the wireless network being broadcast from the router. If you wish to change this, please log into the router, then select Advanced Settings, then WLAN Settings, then WLAN Basic Settings.
Here you will see Name (SSID). Replace this entry with the name that you wish to apply to the Router and click Apply.
